name: Half-Visible LITE
description:
Half-Visible is a indie 3D computer platformer made by CJ-Studios (me) And developed as a one week challenge. The LITE version includes three levels to begin playing. Some basic rules include:

-If you can't beat a level, jump off the back of the starter platform.
-The music I used is NOT copyrighted, so I could care less what you do with it.
-WASD to move
-Space to jump

Thanks for playing! 

(We are currently working on the full version!)
